text: Randy Foye (born September 24, 1983) is an American basketball player. He played for the Oklahoma City Thunder and Los Angeles Clippers. Foye was selected with the seventh overal pick in the NBA Draft 2006.NBA Draft 2006 In 2007, Foye was selected for the NBA All-Rookie First Team. == References == == Other websites == * Randy Foye at 82games.com * Randy Foye at nba.com Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Los Angeles Clippers players Category:Oklahoma City Thunder players
title: Randy Foye
